OrgName.entry: BEIGHTON ROAD HOUSEHOLD WASTE RECYCLING CENTRE

Desc.entry: Household rubbish can be disposed of free of charge. Recycle: Paper, Glass, Textiles & Clothing, Plastics, Steel Cans, Aluminium & Foil, Furniture, Motor Oil, Mobile Phones, Domestic Paint, Green Waste, Books, Card, Rubble, Shoes, Car Batteries, Scrap Metal, Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Wood, Household Batteries, Fluorescent tubes/lamps. No trade waste.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Sun 8am-7.30pm (Apr-Sep), Mon-Sun 8am-5.30pm (Oct-Mar), in line with British Summertime, closed Christmas Day, Boxing Day & New Years Day
